entry.data:
CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LESS HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
